Linus and Luke discuss Nvidia being hit with a class action lawsuit over allegedly using YouTube videos to train its AI model without permission. They break down the copyright claims and debate whether AI training crosses the line into piracy. 

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EfQyfM0oQnk

title: YouTubers Are Suing Nvidia
